content.description: A linear graph of the acceleration of an object as a function of time has a slope <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"> <mi>S</mi> </math>. The area bounded by the line and the time axis from <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> is <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math>. The velocity of the object at <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> is <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>.
content.question: Which of the following expressions represent the velocity <math alttext="v sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>v</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </math> of the object at time <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub 0 plus A times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="v sub 0 plus S, times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
